job.title: Frontend Software Engineer
job.description: Fifth Season is a highgrowth venturebacked startup using robots IoT and data analytics to transform the indoor vertical farming industry Our implementation combines a fleet of physical robots and IoTenabled devices to provide a complete cloudmanaged farmltbrgtltbrgtWe produce significant yields compared to traditional farms while using up to 95 less water avoiding topsoil degradation and reducing runoff pollution Our smart indoor farms deliver perfect pure produce no matter the season or location Leafy greens are just the beginning as we move forward in revolutionizing farm to plateltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWere seeking a Frontend Engineer with experience in React to help lead the development of the internal information system software that our company uses to manage and analyze our growing processltstronggt This will include everything from the UI used by daytoday farm operators to the management of and data analysis from a fleet of IoT sensors to the control and settings for robots and mechatronics systems about the farmltbrgtltbrgtYoull work directly with our founding team and our tightknit crossfunctional engineering team to apply industry knowledge in an emerging space and make an impact on the worldltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhat youll work on ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtCreating the user interface for our internal farm applicationltligtltligtCreating mobiledevice based user applications ltligtltligtDeploying intuitive visualization of data to drive actionable insights ltligtltligtFacilitate workflows and UX considerations spanning novice to expertlevel usersltligtltligtIntegrating with 3rd party reporting and visualization tools ltligtltligtReducing the effort of lifts by integrating with third party tools and providers libraries cloud servicesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWhat were looking forltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtAt least 3 years experience in frontend software development preferably in cloudbased products or roboticsltligtltligtExperience with JavaScript Reactjs JSX FluxRedux NodejsltligtltligtExperience with REST API fundamentals request handling data modeling ltligtltligtHandson experience working with various database and data pipeline technologiesltligtltligtUnderstanding of code versioning tools Git issue tracking tools and process and peer reviewltligtltligtExperience and a passion for writing modular reusable code that is well tested ltligtltligtBA or higher in Computer Science Computer Engineering or similar degreeltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtNice to have but not required ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtSome experience with Grafana Dashboard and TableaultligtltligtExperience with continuous integration and deploymentltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWho We AreltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtFifth Season has developed a oneofkind technology solution for autonomous indoor vertical farming by combining a fleet of robotics with IoTenabled devices for a complete cloudmanaged integrated farm system These hyperlocal smart farms allow for healthy delicious chemicalfree produce to be delivered without wasteful longdistance distribution And our patented recipes allow our produce to have weeks  not days  of shelf lifeltbrgtltbrgtHealthy food has become convenient but were here to make it truly fresh  both nationally via grocery retailers and locally via directtoconsumer ecommerce Were bringing joy and delight to consumers that are ready for a food revolution with a new category of fresh foodltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtIf you share our mission of making a positive impact on consumers and the planet we want to hear from you ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtPowered by JazzHRltbrgtltbrgt6VwpmIiWXe
